title: Verify destination table displays all destinations with SEO content
description: Validate that the destination table renders with all destinations that have SEO content and all data matches CMS records
preconditions: Admin is logged into CMS dashboard; Navigate to Content Management System > SEO Content Management
step_2_expected: Table renders with all destinations that have SEO content
step_3_expected: All data matches CMS records accurately

title: Verify search functionality filters destinations by name
description: Test that typing in search field filters destination results instantly with partial name matching
preconditions: Destination table is displayed with multiple entries
step_1_expected: Search field is visible and active
step_3_expected: Results show destinations matching 'Thai' (e.g. Thailand); Partial name matches are supported

title: Verify destination table default sorting by last updated
description: Validate that destination table loads sorted by Last Updated column in descending order
preconditions: Destination table contains multiple entries with different update times
step_2_action: Observe the default order of destinations
step_2_expected: Table is sorted by Last Updated column
step_3_expected: Most recently updated destination appears first

title: Verify Add New Destination button opens dialog
description: Test that clicking Add New Destination button opens the country selection dialog
preconditions: User is viewing the Destination Table
step_1_action: Locate the Add New Destination button
step_3_expected: Dialog displays country selection interface

title: Verify status toggle switches between Live and Hidden
description: Validate that status toggle updates immediately and reflects on frontend correctly
preconditions: At least one destination exists in the table
step_1_action: Locate a destination with Hidden status
step_3_expected: Live destinations appear on frontend; Hidden destinations do not appear on frontend

title: Verify Edit action opens content editor for selected destination
description: Test that clicking Edit button navigates to the correct destination content management page
preconditions: Multiple destinations exist in the table
step_3_expected: Editor displays content for the selected destination

title: Verify Delete action removes destination permanently
description: Validate that Delete action removes destination from CMS and frontend permanently
preconditions: At least one test destination exists that can be deleted
step_3_expected: Destination is removed from CMS table
step_4_expected: Destination no longer appears on frontend

title: Verify error state when no search results found
description: Test that appropriate error message displays when search returns no matches
step_1_action: Type non-existent country name in search (e.g. ZZZZZ)
step_1_expected: Text is entered in search field
step_2_expected: System displays No results found message
step_3_expected: Message is clearly visible to user

title: Verify country list loads from price config
description: Validate that Add New Destination dialog displays all countries from backend price configuration
preconditions: Click Add New Destination button to open dialog
step_1_action: Observe the country list in the dialog
step_2_action: Verify countries match backend price config

title: Verify countries are sorted alphabetically by default
description: Test that country list in dialog displays in alphabetical order A-Z
preconditions: Add New Destination dialog is open
step_1_action: Observe the order of countries in the list
step_1_expected: Countries are sorted A-Z by name
step_2_expected: Afghanistan or similar appears first alphabetically

title: Verify search filters country list instantly
description: Validate that typing in country search field filters list instantly with partial matching
preconditions: Dialog is open with full country list visible
step_1_action: Type partial country name in search field (e.g. indo)
step_2_expected: List filters instantly as user types
step_3_expected: Partial matches are displayed (e.g. Indonesia)

title: Verify error state when country search has no matches
description: Test that appropriate error message displays when country search returns no results
preconditions: Dialog is open with search field available
step_2_expected: System displays No results found message clearly

title: Verify already added countries show as Added
description: Validate that previously added countries display Added label in the selection list
preconditions: Some countries are already added as destinations
step_2_action: Locate countries that were previously added
step_2_expected: Previously added countries display Added label
step_3_expected: These countries are visually distinct from available ones

title: Verify already added countries are disabled/unselectable
description: Test that countries marked as Added cannot be selected again
preconditions: Dialog displays countries with some marked as Added
step_1_action: Try to select a country marked as Added
step_3_expected: No selection occurs

title: Verify only one country can be selected at a time
description: Validate that radio button behavior allows only single country selection
preconditions: Dialog is open with multiple available countries
step_2_expected: Selecting new country deselects previous one
step_3_expected: Radio button behavior is correct; only one selected

title: Verify Add button is disabled by default
description: Test that Add button is in disabled state when dialog opens with no selection
preconditions: Dialog just opened with no country selected
step_2_expected: Button appears grayed out or inactive

title: Verify Add button enables when country is selected
description: Validate that Add button becomes enabled after country selection
preconditions: Dialog is open with Add button disabled
step_1_expected: Country is selected via radio button
step_3_expected: Button is clickable and active

title: Verify Add button redirects to content management page
description: Test that clicking Add button navigates to destination content editor
preconditions: Country is selected and Add button is enabled
step_2_expected: System redirects to Content Management Page for the selected country
